author: PTI
title: Marvel should release ‘Black Widow’ digitally, says David Harbour
description: The actor also said the pandemic has delayed the release of ‘Stranger Things’ season four
content:
Stranger Things star David Harbour has suggested Marvel Studios to release his upcoming film Black Widow online amid the coronavirus pandemic.
 Starring Scarlett Johansson in the title role, the film which was scheduled to be released on May 1, has been post… [+935 chars]
